1370: Brun moved to Cromme straet.B.1 after marriage.
Got married to Ghodelde at age 37 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Ghodelde, Brun, at age 38.
1372: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Verthwi, at age 39.
1373: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Soeten, at age 40.
1374: Had a son with Ghodelde, Menzone, at age 41.
1376: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Lelien, at age 43.
Lost daughter Soeten when Soeten was 4 years old.
1378: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Ghodelde, at age 45.
Lost daughter Lelien when Lelien was 3 years old.
